mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (user_id, order_date, total_price, status) VALUES (#{userId}, #{orderDate}, #{totalPrice}, #{status})
INSERT INTO order_items (order_id, item_id, quantity) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{itemId}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, user_id AS userId, order_date AS orderDate, total_price AS totalPrice, status AS status FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC
